word: W. C. WHITE: WE HAVE ADOPTED THE NEW DOCTRINE OF NATURAL DEVELOPMENT. WE WILL LET THE WORK IN SAN FRANCISCO, LOS ANGELES, AND SAN DIEGO DEVELOP NATURALLY. WHILE WE ARE DEVELOPING IN SO MANY OTHER PLACES, IT LOOKS TO SOME AS IF THE PATRONAGE HERE WOULD NATURALLY BE LESS, AND THAT WE SHOULD RESAIL, AND SAIL ALONG VERY CAREFULLY, LETTING THIS BUSINESS LIVE, IF WE CAN, WITH WHAT IS LEFT AFTER THE OTHERS HAVE TAKEN THEIR SHARE.
